name: Ground Effect Pro
description:
by Glenn Corpes.

** Please note that if you have a 2.3+ (Gingerbread or above) device, you may prefer the XHD version which is specially optimised and adds Stereoscopic 3D support (with 3D glasses) **

** This version supports Glasses Free Stereo 3D for the LG Optimus 3D and Sharp devices that support Stereo 3D **

Stunning visuals and a pumping sound track make this ground-breaking game the way perfect way to show off what your phone can do! Nominated last year for a Best App Ever Award on iPhone and was featured multiple times on the App Store under both New and Noteworthy and What's Hot, this is fast-paced, arcade style ekranoplan racing action at it's very best. Boasting incredible 3D graphic detail and procedural landscapes never before seen in any game of its type, the game will appeal to lovers of fast-paced, competitive action genres as well as those who prefer something more sedate and relaxing.

14 challenging levels await you with big jumps, steep drops and twisting paths to master. Hunt down your opponents one by one in an attempt to take a medal and unlock the next track or challenge your previous best time in a head to head ghost race.

Choose to follow one of the pre-prescribed routes and accumulate boosts by successfully steering through check points, or simply ignore the markers/towers and guidance and choose to explore the road less travelled. Whichever you choose, you're guaranteed a beautiful journey!

Features include:

* 14 challenging levels
* 10 different Ground Effect craft
* Stunning terrains (both land and sea)
* Free roaming – explore at will
* Impressive draw distance
* Sensitive and intuitive flight controls
* Throttle speed controller
* High score recording
* Replay & ghost-race modes
* Boost control
* Day and night scenarios
* Driver/1st person camera view
* Free-play practice levels
* App2sd supported

Please email us with questions or feedback.
